name: TotalIRCd
short_description: TotalIRCd an modified IRC daemon to suite TotalIRC´s needs, released so others can enjoy the benifits of it, MD5 hostmark encryption, Channel Prefix's, such as halfops, protect, owner, Services admin, and much more. /RULES, add lines to the ircd.conf.
